translation.en: ♪ Check me out ♪
translation.zh: 片名：速度与激情 东京漂移

translation.en: ♪ Negotiations breaking down ♪
♪ Come come come come come with it ♪
translation.zh:
（加油 鸭队
打败印第安队）

translation.en: ♪ It's April Fools' day ♪ ♪ What time is it? ♪
Nice ride.
It does the job.
What job, delivering pizzas?
Well, it's not the ride, it's the rider.
translation.zh: 车不重要 关键是开车的人

translation.en: What the hell was that? What?
translation.zh:
-嗨 你们在干嘛呢？
-怎么啦？

translation.en: Hey! You talking to my girl?
translation.zh: 嗨！你干嘛和我女友说话？

translation.en: -Oh, shit. Here we go. -Yeah.
She was just admiring my ride.
translation.zh: 她只是对我的车印象深刻罢了

translation.en: My ride.
My grandma's Buick could smoke that piece of shit,
translation.zh:
我奶奶的别克老爷车
都要比你那破垃圾跑得快！

translation.en: trailer trash.
Well, what about your daddy's Viper?
translation.zh:
那你老爸的道奇“蝰蛇”又有什么
了不起的？

translation.en: This beast's got 500 horsepower and a Borla exhaust system.
translation.zh:
我的车有500马力
美国土炮排气系统

translation.en: It does 0 to 60 in, like, 4.3 seconds.
translation.zh:
马力全开时0到
100公里只要4 3秒！

translation.en: -That's about right. -That's about right.
-Yeah. -Wow. You can read the brochure.
translation.zh:
哇噢 你先看看
这车的说明书再吹吧！

translation.en: -Let's make it happen. -Bring it.
Why don't you nice boys let your cars do the talking?
translation.zh:
帅哥们
为何不用你们的车子比试比试？

translation.en: I only race for pink slips.
translation.zh: 我从来都只玩“胜者赢车！”

translation.en: This car goes for 80 grand.
What would I do with a broken-ass piece of shit like that?
translation.zh: 我要你那臭垃圾做什么？

translation.en: How about me?
Winner gets me.
Woo!
translation.zh:
（香格里拉小镇
让您梦想成真）

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 剪开 让我们剪开 快走！

translation.en: Buzz off, baby!
First one out the other side.
translation.zh:
谁第一个跑到街的另一头
谁就获胜！

translation.en: Baby! Let's go!
Ready, boys? Make it interesting, Clay.
translation.zh:
-准备好了吗 帅哥们？
-克莱 别搞砸了！

translation.en: Shit!
Yeah!
I thought you loved me.
translation.zh: 我还以为你对我是认真的呢！

translation.en: Oh, well.
What the hell?
Guess I got a new date for prom.
translation.zh: 看来我高中舞会有新主儿了！

translation.en: -Clay, stop the car! -Shut up!
-Clay, stop the car! -Shut up!
translation.zh:
-克莱！快给我停车！
-你给我闭嘴！

translation.en: Stop it!
Clay, please stop! Please stop!
translation.zh: 克莱 求求你快停车！求求你！

translation.en: Can I get a copy of that?
translation.zh: 能给我一份那个的拷贝么？

translation.en: You think this is a joke, huh?
translation.zh: 你认为这是在开玩笑 是吗？

translation.en: You see Ken and Barbie over there?
translation.zh: 看看那边的克莱和芭比

translation.en: They're gonna walk out of here without even a slap on the wrist.
translation.zh: 他们甚至连警告都不会有就能出去

translation.en: Mommy and Daddy are too hooked up.
translation.zh: 爸爸 妈妈会来想办法把他们接走的

translation.en: But I like screw-ups like you.
You know why? 'Cause you're 100 percent guaranteed conviction.
translation.zh:
知道为什么吗？
因为你绝对会被判罪

translation.en: -Where's my car? -I crushed it.
translation.zh:
-我的车在哪儿？
-送到垃圾场打包了

translation.en: You did what?
-Sit down! -Easy. Easy.
You're done. You understand me?
translation.zh:
-坐下！你完蛋了
-冷静 你完蛋了 你听不懂吗？

translation.en: You're done. And all before your 18th birthday. Now sit down.
translation.zh: 在你成人前你就废啦！给我坐下！

translation.en: Sean.
What the hell were you thinkin', huh?
Mrs. Boswell? Please.
It's--it's Miss.
Officer, is it illegal to smoke in here?
translation.zh: 警官先生 我可以在这儿抽烟么？

translation.en: It's a tough state. And it's a pretty clear-cut case.
translation.zh: 他的处境不妙啊！结案会结得很快

translation.en: He'll be lucky if they don't try him as an adult.
translation.zh:
若把他当作未成年人来处理的话
他会没事的！

translation.en: This is our third town in two years.
translation.zh: 我们2年内都搬了3次家了

translation.en: Your son's got two priors for reckless driving, willful destruction of property.
translation.zh:
您的孩子前科累累
分别是鲁莽驾车和破坏公共财产

translation.en: This makes it strike three.
translation.zh: 这次是他第三次犯事了

translation.en: They're definitely gonna want to get him off the streets.
translation.zh: 他们绝对会让他入狱的

translation.en: Well, there's just got to be another way.
translation.zh: 应该会有其他办法的 对不对？

translation.en: So, where are we moving this time?
translation.zh: 我们这次又往哪儿搬呢？

translation.en: We are not moving anywhere.
Sean.
I thought you were gonna be here on the 7th.
Today is the 7th.
Well, look, just hold on one second.
Come on in.
This is it.
You know, Sean, I was-- I was gonna be there.
translation.zh: 肖恩 我本来要去机场接你的

translation.en: But your mom, she said the 7th, see,
and we're a day ahead of you in Japan.
translation.zh: 在日本 我们比你们的时区早一天

translation.en: Well, you're here now, and that's good.
translation.zh: 既然你到了 就好了

translation.en: So, how is your mom?
Where do I sleep?
Now, Sean, you know she had no other choice.
translation.zh: 肖恩 你也知道她也是别无选择

translation.en: I mean, it was either this or juvie hall,
translation.zh: 我是说 你不来这里 就要进少管所

translation.en: I mean, you just can't keep moving away
translation.zh:
我是说 你不来这里 就要进少管所 我的意思是你们不能
每次遇到问题就搬走

translation.en: every time you get into trouble.
translation.zh:
我的意思是你们不能
每次遇到问题就搬走

translation.en: Worked for you.
Look, neither of us asked for this.
translation.zh: 听着 我们谁都不愿这样！

translation.en: But I promised your mom I'd take care of you.
translation.zh: 但我答应你妈妈会好好照顾你

translation.en: So you just go by the rules her and I agreed to,
translation.zh: 所以如果你在这儿遵守我的规矩

translation.en: and I'm sure you'll manage just fine.
translation.zh:
所以如果你在这儿遵守我的规矩 -你就不会有麻烦
-规矩？

translation.en: Rules?
Yeah, rules. Real simple.
translation.zh: 没错 规矩 很简单

translation.en: You go to school, you come back here right after.
translation.zh: 你乖乖上学 放学就回家

translation.en: And I don't want to see or hear about you anywhere near a car.
translation.zh: 我不想看见或听到你又和车扯上关系

translation.en: Here, the bedroom is yours.
Make yourself comfortable.
Lights out in ten.
You got to be kiddin'.
♪ Wooie! ♪
-Wrong train. -Huh?
I'm new here.
-Boswell-kun? -Boswell, yes, ma'am.
Japanese food is like the Army.
Don't ask, don't tell.
translation.zh: 什么也别问 他们什么都不会说的

translation.en: Name's Twinkie. Hey, I noticed you ain't have a laptop.
translation.zh:
我叫特文克
我注意到了 你没有手提电脑？

translation.en: Yeah?
I'll hook you up. Half price.
60 percent off. Hmm?
translation.zh:
不用了！ 那4折怎么样？
大家是军人的孩子嘛！

translation.en: Since we're both army brats and everything.
translation.zh:
那4折怎么样？
大家是军人的孩子嘛！

translation.en: I ain't got no cash, man.
And I ain't an army brat.
translation.zh: 我也不是什么军人的孩子

translation.en: All right, all right. Well, what about a cell phone, huh?
translation.zh: 那好 要不买部手机怎么样？

translation.en: Everybody needs a cell phone.
No offense, but I'm probably not gonna be here
translation.zh:
说了你别介意 估计我待在这儿的时间
短到会记不住你的名字

translation.en: long enough to remember your name.
translation.zh:
估计我待在这儿的时间
短到会记不住你的名字

translation.en: Then you gonna need some new shoes to book town with, man.
translation.zh:
那你应该会需要双
鞋子来到处逛逛吧？

translation.en: You like Michael Jordan? I love Michael Jordan.
translation.zh: 你喜欢迈克尔乔丹么？我爱死他了！

translation.en: Check this out.
Brand new Jordans. Not even out yet.
translation.zh: 全新乔丹鞋！店里都还没有出售呢

translation.en: LeBron James couldn't even get his hands on those.
translation.zh: 勒布朗詹姆斯甚至都别想有这双鞋

translation.en: You selling that Sparco steering wheel?
translation.zh:
你连Sparco的
方向盘也有得卖？

translation.en: Hell, no. That's mine right there.
Man, I even paid retail for it.
translation.zh: 伙计 我可是全价买的

translation.en: What you drive?
Oh, my ride?
-Yeah. -Yeah. My ride's one of a kind.
translation.zh:
-我的车？
-是的 -我的车与众不同
-给我看看

translation.en: Show me.
Thought you weren't stickin' around.
translation.zh: 尽管你在这待不了多久

translation.en: All right.
Slamming, huh? Look at that car.
translation.zh: 很厉害吧 看看那车

translation.en: At least let me drive.
Y'all better have some real cars around here.
translation.zh: 你们最好在这有辆真正的车

translation.en: Okay. I see somebody got jokes, huh? Well, all right.
translation.zh: 我看到某人爱讲笑话了 好吧

translation.en: I don't know if you're ready for them, though.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是是否准备好开车了

translation.en: You look a little nervous.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是是否准备好开车了 你看着有点紧张

translation.en: What up, Tosh?
translation.zh: 你看着有点紧张 还好吗 多什？

translation.en: For when you blow your wad, man.
Hear that?
It's still not right for the way I drive.
translation.zh: 还是不适合我开车的方式

translation.en: I don't need a computer to tell me about my throttle response.
translation.zh: 我不用电脑告诉我节流阀的反应

translation.en: Okay. Then we're done here.
translation.zh: 那好 那我们就无能为力了

translation.en: You wouldn't have that problem with a V8.
Boys.
All they care about is who's got the biggest engine.
translation.zh: 他们只关心谁的引擎大

translation.en: I'm a guy. It's in my DNA.
translation.zh: 我是男的 骨子里就关心那个

translation.en: So y'all race with these things, huh? Cute little toys.
translation.zh:
那么你们就是用这个比赛？
可爱的玩具

translation.en: You know, I almost didn't recognize you without your slippers on.
translation.zh: 你没带制轮器我差点没认出你

translation.en: Don't you mean wabaki?
Neela, right?
You're a quick learner.
So, where you from, anyway?
Here.
No. I mean, not where you live. Where'd you come from?
translation.zh: 我不是问你住哪 你老家在哪？

translation.en: Does it really matter where I'm from?
Who's the tourist?
What's with you and the schoolgirls, D?
translation.zh: D 你和女孩们怎么了？

translation.en: You're moving up in the world. You gotta elevate your company.
translation.zh:
你现在有点名气了
要找好一点的对象

translation.en: Wednesday, Wednesday, meet Thursday. God. Girl.
translation.zh:
这是周三女孩 周三女孩
来见一见周四女孩

translation.en: Ladies, hold that thought, all right? All right, beautiful. Hold up.
translation.zh:
姑娘们 等一下 好吗？
美人们 等一下

translation.en: He was just leaving.
I'm sorry. I don't speak Japanese.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不说日语

translation.en: Understand that? Gaijin?
Takashi.
We were just talking.
This isn't your scene.
That word you called me, gaijin or something or other,
translation.zh: 你叫我的“老外”还是什么的

translation.en: what does that mean exactly?
Means, turn around, keep walking.
translation.zh: 意思是 转过身去 一直走

translation.en: That's exactly what we gonna do. Come on, man, let's roll.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要做的 走吧 伙计

translation.en: Yo, look, man, he's Yakuza.
translation.zh: 听着 他是个黑社会

translation.en: Now, see, that's funny,
'cause I thought this was, like, a free country
translation.zh: 我原以为这是个自由的国家

translation.en: Where a girl could talk to whoever she wants.
translation.zh: 在这女孩可以自由地和任何人谈话

translation.en: You know who I am, boy?
translation.zh: 你知道我是谁吗 孩子？

translation.en: Yeah. You're like the Justin Timberlake of Japan, right?
translation.zh: 你就像是日本的贾斯汀汀布莱克

translation.en: Leave.
Damn, man. You know Yakuza? The Mafia?
translation.zh:
见鬼 伙计 你知道
黑社会的意思吧 就像黑手党？

translation.en: Look, sorry, DK-san. Monkey didn't have his banana today.
translation.zh: 抱歉 DK先生 猴子今天没有香蕉

translation.en: Hey, D, let's go. It's time to race.
translation.zh: 嘿 D 走吧 该比赛了

translation.en: Hey, good luck, Timberlake.
You're the one that's lucky, 'cause I'm about to race.
translation.zh: 你今天走运 因为我要比赛了

translation.en: Then let's race.
With what, huh? Your skateboard?
Easy to sound cocky when you got no ride.
translation.zh: 没车的时候夸海口很容易

translation.en: Take mine.
Let's race.
What? I wanna see what the kid's got.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我想看看这孩子有啥本事

translation.en: Can he drive?
Can he drive?
You know what DK stands for?
Donkey Kong?
Drift King.
Drift?
What do you mean, drift?
Still need a dictionary?
translation.zh: 还需要用字典查一查吗？

translation.en: You know that real famous painting?
The one of the woman who's smiling all the time? The Mona Lisa.
translation.zh: 就是一个女人一直微笑的那张？

translation.en: Right, right, right, right. Mona Lisa.
Well, look, man, this car right here's like the Mona Lisa of the drift world.
translation.zh:
听着 这辆车就是漂移界的
《蒙娜丽莎》

translation.en: Han rebuilt this bad boy from ground up.
We talking forged pistons,
translation.zh:
韩完全改造了这辆车 我是说改造过的活塞
更大的发动机 新的牵引杆和机轴

translation.en: bigger turbo, new rods, new crankshaft.
translation.zh:
我是说改造过的活塞
更大的发动机 新的牵引杆和机轴

translation.en: Hey, man, Han's labor ain't cheap, man, you feel me?
translation.zh: 韩的改造成果可是不便宜 明白吗？

translation.en: Well, if I needed a 30-second lesson on how to drift--
translation.zh: 我需要个30秒的教程学一下漂移

translation.en: There's lots of ways you can do this, all right?
translation.zh: 听着 伙计 有好多办法 明白吗？

translation.en: Hand braking is the easiest, so the first thing I want you
to do, I want you to rip that e-brake.
translation.zh:
所以我要你做的第一件事
就是紧急刹车

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh:
所以我要你做的第一件事
就是紧急刹车 然后开足马力

translation.en: After you rip the e-brake, then I want you to power over.
You know what? Just don't mess up Mona, all right?
translation.zh: 别搞砸了蒙娜丽莎就行了

translation.en: All right.
Ready.
Set.
Go!
I told you.
Damn it!
Damn it!
Don't leave town.
Do you know what time it is?
I thought it was around 7 o'clock.
You know, U.S. is a few hours behind.
translation.zh: 美国时间比这里晚几个小时

translation.en: Looks like the party was better here, anyway.
translation.zh: 看起来这边的派对更好

translation.en: Have you been racing, Sean?
You're out of here.
Go ahead.
You don't get it, do you?
You have nowhere else to go.
If it doesn't work out here, you're going to jail. Do you get that?
translation.zh:
如果你不能待在这
你就得去坐牢 明白吗？

translation.en: This isn't a game. And I'm gonna tell you one more time,
translation.zh: 这不是游戏 我再告诉你一次

translation.en: if you're gonna live under my roof, you're gonna go by my rules or get out.
translation.zh:
你要想住这
你要么遵守我的规则 要么搬出去

translation.en: Understand?
Understand?
Yes, sir.
Get in.
I'll get you your money.
Why you talking like you have a choice?
There's a guy in there with a paw that owes me some money.
translation.zh: 那边有个“爪牙”的家伙欠我一些钱

translation.en: A paw?
Go get me my money.
Okay.
Han said, um...
okane.
Han said okane.
Let's go.
You're in the pickup and delivery business now.
translation.zh: 你现在要给我做送货的生意了

translation.en: I might call you once a week or once an hour.
translation.zh:
（VeilSide改装） 我一周一次或一小时一次
打电话给你

translation.en: I don't care if you're sick as a dog or in bed with Beyoncé.
translation.zh:
我不管你生没生病
或者在床上和小妞鬼混

translation.en: I call, you show.
translation.zh: 我打电话 你就得来

translation.en: Only if you teach me how to drift. This ain't a negotiation.
translation.zh:
-除非你教我漂移
-没有讨价还价的余地

translation.en: I wasn't negotiating.
What's he doing here?
He's paying me back for that crumpled beer can sitting in my garage.
translation.zh: 他来赔我车库里撞坏的车

translation.en: Hope he's not driving.
Gaijin.
When is your next race? I'd really like to be there.
translation.zh: 下次比赛什么时候？我很想去

translation.en: Why not be in it?
You heard me.
Ready to lose another car, Han?
translation.zh: 还想失去另一辆车 韩？

translation.en: I'm ready to take that '86 Corolla off your hands.
All right.
Put up the '72 Skyline.
translation.zh: 要你那辆地平线72做赌注吧

translation.en: Done.
What do you think, Morimoto, huh?
Get him out of here.
We have business to discuss.
Your shipment's late.
Since when are you so worried about the details?
translation.zh: 你从啥时候开始关心起细节来了？

translation.en: When is the shipment arriving, Han?
Just sit pretty and let me handle it.
Hey, Dad, it's me.
I had to stay after school for some extracurricular activities.
translation.zh: 放学后我得留下 有一些课外活动

translation.en: So I'll be home a little later.
translation.zh: （酒吧 小吃店） 我回去可能晚点

translation.en: Sir.
You really need to stop following me around.
What are you doing here?
I thought I'd stop by and ask your boyfriend for some drifting lessons.
translation.zh: 我顺便来看看 向你的男友学漂移

translation.en: Trust me. You don't wanna be a part of this world.
translation.zh: 相信我 你不会想参与进来的

translation.en: It's good enough for you.
You don't know anything about me.
Well, why don't you think I know?
translation.zh: 为什么你以为我不了解？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a gaijin? An outsider?
Let me guess.
You're an army brat who moved around a lot.
translation.zh: 你是军队里长大的孩子 总在搬家

translation.en: Your mama and daddy was never home.
So you walked around pissed off all the time
and now you found your family with these drift nuts.
translation.zh: 现在你把这些漂移一族当作一家人

translation.en: Zero for one, cowboy.
Why can't you go find a nice Japanese girl
translation.zh: 你为何不像这里的其他白人那样

translation.en: like the rest of the white guys around here?
Is everything okay back there?
I can handle DK.
I thought he's Yakuza.
His uncle's Yakuza.
He's just playing gangster in his little storage room.
translation.zh: 他只是在他的小圈子里做个小流氓

translation.en: But I need him.
He keeps Uncle Kamata from poking around too much.
translation.zh: 他让他叔叔不来过问我过多事情

translation.en: What do you mean?
Well, his uncle gets a piece of the action from everyone on his turf.
translation.zh: 他地盘上的每个生意他叔叔都要抽成

translation.en: We're on his turf.
50 percent of something is better than 100 percent of nothing.
translation.zh: 能留下一半总比什么都没有强

translation.en: So have you raced DK?
Why not? Is he that good?
translation.zh: 为什么没有呢 他有那么强吗？

translation.en: What's the point of a race?
To see if I'm better than the other guy.
translation.zh: 看看我是不是比别人强

translation.en: Just proves you're faster, that's all.
If I were to race, it would have to be for something important.
translation.zh: 如果我去比赛 一定是为了重要的事

translation.en: Or why else do it at all?
translation.zh: 如果我去比赛 一定是为了重要的事 否则为什么去做呢？

translation.en: Why are you letting me race?
'Cause you're DK's kryptonite.
And you owe me a car.
Oh, shit.
What the--
Police cars here are only factory-tuned.
translation.zh: 警车的引擎是标准引擎

translation.en: You can do better than 180k, they can't catch you,
translation.zh:
你可以时速大于180
他们追不上你

translation.en: so they don't even try.
You know what? I'm beginning to like this country already.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我开始喜欢这个国家了

translation.en: Danny!
Oh, you're looking good.
Disco.
We gotta catch up. Get you a drink on me, huh?
translation.zh:
我们得聊一聊
自己要一杯酒吧 算我请你

translation.en: Let's go.
Uh-oh. Easy now, ladies.
Come on.
What's up? How you doing?
Hey, baby.
Keep your hands off the kid, girls. He's underage.
translation.zh: 别碰那孩子 姑娘们 他还没到年龄

translation.en: Ladies, ladies, ladies. Disneyland for grownups, huh?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 成人的迪斯尼乐园吧

translation.en: All these girls, man, they look like--
translation.zh:
-所有这些姑娘 就像是…
-什么？模特？

translation.en: What, models? Check it out.
translation.zh:
-所有这些姑娘 就像是…
-什么？模特？ 看

translation.en: See, Tokyo is the fashion capital on this side of the planet, all right?
translation.zh: 东京是地球这边的时尚之都

translation.en: Now, imagine you been posing all day.
translation.zh:
东京是地球这边的时尚之都 假设你摆了一整天的姿势
我是说 那是很多活

translation.en: I mean, that's a lot of hard work.
translation.zh:
假设你摆了一整天的姿势
我是说 那是很多活

translation.en: Not only do you get tired, but, on top of that,
translation.zh:
假设你摆了一整天的姿势
我是说 那是很多活 你不仅仅累了 此外

translation.en: you wanna have a little fun, but you can't
translation.zh:
你不仅仅累了 此外 你还想找点乐趣 但你做不到
因为你在城里谁都不认识

translation.en: 'cause you don't even know nobody in town.
translation.zh:
你还想找点乐趣 但你做不到
因为你在城里谁都不认识

translation.en: And most of the guys around here are too chicken shit to even try picking up one.
translation.zh:
你还想找点乐趣 但你做不到
因为你在城里谁都不认识 这边大多数家伙胆子太小 都不敢找一个妞儿

translation.en: So what do you do?
Man, you talk to the little dude who makes you laugh.
translation.zh: 你得认识让你开心的人

translation.en: Yeah.
Look, man, I don't just think outside the box. I tear it up.
translation.zh:
听着 伙计 我不受约束
我打破常规

translation.en: That's my thing.
Sean!
-The red Evo's yours. -♪ There it go ♪
♪ So Girl let me see you get low ♪
What do you mean?
You're representing me now.
What you think, I'm gonna let you roll in a Hyundai?
translation.zh: 你以为呢 我让你开现代吗？

translation.en: Oh, man.
Damn it.
My mother, she's blind in one eye and she can drift better than that.
translation.zh:
我妈妈 一只眼瞎了
漂移都比这个强

translation.en: Han, where did you find this guy?
translation.zh: 韩 从哪找来的这家伙？

translation.en: Will someone please teach this guy how to drift?
Is that yours?
Sure is.
What happened?
I don't know. I found it this way at the base.
translation.zh: 不知道 在军事基地发现的

translation.en: It's got potential.
Yeah, maybe. We'll see.
translation.zh: 有可能 我们看看吧

translation.en: You know, Sean, the Japanese have a saying.
translation.zh: 你知道 肖恩 日本有句俗话

translation.en: The nail that sticks out gets hammered.
You're gonna be late.
Sean!
Come on, man, you broke it.
translation.zh: 得了 你自己弄坏的

translation.en: Hey, whoa, whoa.
There must be a misunderstanding.
Out of my way, or you're next.
translation.zh: 让开 否则你是下一个

translation.en: Take it easy. Hey, look, man, I don't do refunds, all right?
translation.zh:
-冷静点
-听着 我不退货 明白吗？

translation.en: Okay, let's go, then!
Let's go!
Here.
Try not to break this one.
Say, man! What the hell is wrong with you, huh?
Now everybody's gonna want exchanges around here.
Damn!
Not easy saving the day, is it?
Maybe you could give me some pointers sometime.
translation.zh: 也许你有时可以给我点建议

translation.en: You're doing all right.
Thanks.
Hey.
Yeah?
Sorry about the other night.
translation.zh: 关于那天晚上的事 我很抱歉

translation.en: Your life isn't any of my business.
It's okay.
♪ Everywhere that I go ♪
Foul!
Ain't no damn foul. That was a foul.
-Yo, you in my face. -That was a foul.
Hey, Han, sort this wanker out.
translation.zh: 韩 把这烂人轰出去

translation.en: -A wanker? -What do I look like, a zebra?
translation.zh: 烂人？ 我看起来像是裁判吗？

translation.en: So, how did you end up over here, anyway?
Well, you know those old Westerns
translation.zh: 你知道以前的那些西部电影中

translation.en: where the cowboys make a run for the border?
translation.zh: 你知道以前的那些西部电影中 那些牛仔跑路越境吗？

translation.en: This is my Mexico.
Why'd you let me race with your car?
translation.zh: 为什么让我开你的车比赛？

translation.en: You knew I was gonna wreck it.
Why not?
'Cause it's a lot of money.
I have money.
It's trust and character I need around me.
translation.zh: 我需要周围有信得过并且有性格的人

translation.en: You know, who you choose to be around you lets you know who you are.
translation.zh:
你选择和谁呆在一起
你就会成为那样的人

translation.en: And one car in exchange for knowing what a man's made of,
translation.zh: 用一辆车来了解一个人的脾性

translation.en: that's a price I can live with.
Look at all those people down there.
They follow the rules, for what?
translation.zh: 他们循规蹈矩 为何？

translation.en: They're letting fear lead them.
translation.zh: 他们让恐惧带领着他们

translation.en: What happens if they don't?
Life's simple. You make choices and you don't look back.
translation.zh: 生活很简单 作出选择 不回头

translation.en: So, if you don't drift to win, what do you drift for?
translation.zh:
如果你不是为了赢去漂移
那又是为了什么？

translation.en: You really want to know? Yeah.
Okay. Let's go.
There's no "wax on, wax off" with drifting.
translation.zh: 学习漂移不需要什么理论

translation.en: Learn by doin' it.
The first drifters invented drifting out here in the mountains by feeling it.
translation.zh:
首先学会漂移的人是在山上开车
感受到的

translation.en: So feel it.
Again!
What's in this bag? You'll see.
How much you got? Keep going, keep going.
I'm so good, man, I could sell rubbers to a monk.
translation.zh:
我太爽了 伙计
我可以卖避孕套给和尚

translation.en: Again.
Again.
Watch it. Watch it. Not too early, now.
Go, go, go, go!
Don't lose it! Don't lose it!
Hey, Twink. Get this man a bunk.
translation.zh: 嘿 特文克 给这家伙个位子

translation.en: Pleasure doing business.
Yeah, baby. I told you. I told you, didn't I?
translation.zh: 耶 宝贝 我说过的 不是吗？

translation.en: It's actually not bad. I didn't even have to put ketchup on it.
translation.zh: 实际上还不错 我甚至都没放番茄酱

translation.en: See, I'm not a total gaijin.
translation.zh: 看 我不是完完全全的老外

translation.en: I hate that word.
It's what they used to call me when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我小时候就被人这么叫

translation.en: I thought you were born here.
translation.zh: 我以为你是这里出生的

translation.en: Well, "outsider" can mean many different things.
My mom died when I was 10.
She came out here from Australia when she finished high school.
translation.zh:
她从澳大利亚来这里
那时才刚中学毕业

translation.en: And all I know about her is that she went to work in a hostess bar.
DK's grandmother took me in.
Well, my parents split up when I was three.
translation.zh: 我爸妈在我3岁时离婚了

translation.en: Me and Mom moved around a lot. Mostly 'cause of me.
translation.zh:
我和我妈搬了好多次家
大多因为我的问题

translation.en: Well, it was all 'cause of me.
translation.zh: 好吧 都是我的问题

translation.en: Kind of made myself an outsider,
you know, without even thinking about it.
translation.zh: 之前想都没想过这个问题

translation.en: But I realize now, outsider or insider, it doesn't really matter.
translation.zh:
但是我现在才知道
是不是外来人都不重要

translation.en: All that matters is knowing what you really want and going after it.
translation.zh: 重要的是知道自己想要什么 然后去争取

translation.en: We used to come up here when we were kids.
Even before we could drive we'd cut class, sneak out,
translation.zh: 我们小时候常到这来 在会开车之前就翘课溜出来

translation.en: come up here, and watch the older kids drift.
translation.zh: 到这看大点的孩子漂移

translation.en: Things were different back then.
Once I got my license, I practically lived up here.
translation.zh:
我一拿到驾照 就基本
上一直在这里了

translation.en: Back then, kids just drove whatever they had.
translation.zh: 那时 孩子们什么车都开

translation.en: You know, we just made do. No one bothered us.
translation.zh: 我们想方设法开车 没人打搅我们

translation.en: The day I got my license is the day I got my first speeding ticket.
translation.zh:
我拿到驾照那天
就是我第一次拿到超速罚单那天

translation.en: The day after that, I won my first race.
translation.zh: 第二天 我第一次赢了比赛

translation.en: I beat this rich kid by three lengths.
translation.zh: 我赢了那富有的孩子三个车身

translation.en: I gotta admit, it felt good.
translation.zh: 我得承认 那感觉真好

translation.en: It felt like--
Like everything else just disappears.
No past and no future. No problems.
Just the moment.
Boy needs to chill.
Hey, Twink, I'm gonna grab another set.
translation.zh: 特文克 我还要一套轮胎

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
Look, that was your third set today. I mean, them tires ain't cheap.
translation.zh:
你今天已经用第三套了
轮胎可不便宜

translation.en: DK, grab a chair. We're about to roast some marshmallows.
translation.zh: DK 坐 我们要烤蘑菇

translation.en: Yo, come on, man, look--
translation.zh: 冷静点 伙计 别…

translation.en: Stay away from her, or the only thing you'll be driving is a wheelchair.
translation.zh: 离她远点 否则你就只能坐轮椅了

translation.en: Find yourself a new driver.
I'm all right. What'd you expect?
You didn't just play with fire, you soaked the matches in gasoline.
translation.zh: 你不只是玩火 而且还是火上浇油

translation.en: It's over.
All this over a gaijin? I am a gaijin.
translation.zh:
-就因为那老外？
-我就是个老外

translation.en: You've changed, DK.
You say I've changed.
But we're not so different, you and I.
translation.zh: 但是我们差不多 你和我

translation.en: We're both products of fuckups, aren't we?
translation.zh: 我们都是烂人的孩子 不是吗？

translation.en: They say your mom was the best trick
in all of Kabukicho back in the day.
translation.zh: 是那时歌舞伎町最火的舞娘

translation.en: Leave my mother out of this.
If we hadn't taken you in, you'd be just like her,
translation.zh: 如果我们不收留你 你就和她一样

translation.en: doing anything for a buck.
Think anyone would take a second look at you if it wasn't for your uncle?
translation.zh: 人们跟随着你还不是因为你叔叔？

translation.en: We're the same, Neela.
translation.zh: 我们是一样的 尼拉

translation.en: Difference is I know who I am and where I belong.
translation.zh: 不同的是我知道自己是谁 属于哪

translation.en: Do you know who you are?
Do you know where you belong?
Hey.
Come on.
Hey, brother.
I vouched for you! Put my reputation on the line for you!
translation.zh:
我为你担保！
用我的名誉为你担保！

translation.en: We were partners!
You think you can keep your side deals from me?
translation.zh: 你以为可以搞小动作坑我？

translation.en: Come on. We ain't in the Boy Scouts.
translation.zh: 别这样 我们不是小孩

translation.en: This is what we do. Takashi!
What about now?
Hmm? Is this what we do?
Man, you need me.
You'd still be shaking down teahouses for chump change if it wasn't for me.
translation.zh:
要不是因为我
你还在敲诈茶室弄钱吧

translation.en: Get in! Go! Go! Go!
Come on.
( honking )
Sean. Sean!
Takashi.
I wouldn't do that if I were you.
Okay.
I'll go with you.
Neela.
See you when Daddy's not around.
translation.zh: 你老爸不在的时候再见我吧

translation.en: I'm putting you on a plane tonight.
-Dad-- -Sean, don't argue with me.
translation.zh:
-你今晚就上飞机走
-爸爸… 肖恩 别和我闹了

translation.en: I did this. I can't run away.
translation.zh: 我把事情搞成这样 我不能逃跑

translation.en: I can't.
Sean, I'm your father. I'm responsible for your well-being.
translation.zh:
肖恩 我是你爸爸
我要对你的安全负责

translation.en: And I'm responsible for my mess.
translation.zh: 我要为自己惹出的麻烦负责

translation.en: I gotta do this.
Can you understand that?
At least you're not redoing my mistakes.
translation.zh: 至少你没重蹈我的覆辙

translation.en: You all right, man?
We're leaving town. Look, I know some people--
translation.zh: 我们得出城 我认识一些人…

translation.en: I can't do it, Twink.
Look, DK wants your head. All right?
translation.zh: 听着 DK要杀你 明白吗？

translation.en: And the trouble you just made for Kamata? You're done here, bro.
translation.zh:
还有你给蒲田惹的麻烦？
你完蛋了 老兄

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to Kamata. What?
DK answers to him.
I know I just didn't hear that.
I gotta end this. I'm gonna go talk to him.
translation.zh: 我要结束这件事 我和他谈

translation.en: What, are you crazy, huh?
Han is dead, all right!
Plus, you can't just walk into Kamata's place, man!
translation.zh: 还有 你不能就这样走到蒲田的地盘

translation.en: It's all I got.
Something I think Han would've wanted you to have.
translation.zh: 我想韩会想让你拿着这个的

translation.en: What's this?
You're gonna need it if you're gonna make it out of Kamata's place alive.
translation.zh:
如果你想活着离开蒲田的地盘
就会用得着的

translation.en: Don't you need it?
No, it's cool. Look, I'll figure it out.
Sean.
You need to leave.
You came to the wrong place.
I didn't come here to see you.
Takashi.
You think you can walk in here,
translation.zh:
你以为 你可以走进来丢
下些钱然后就走出去？

translation.en: dump some cash and walk out?
translation.zh:
你可以走进来丢
下些钱然后就走出去？

translation.en: I know I'm only returning what belonged to you in the first place, sir.
translation.zh: 我首先只是还给你属于你的东西

translation.en: But that's not why I really came.
I came here to apologize.
I know your nephew and I have embarrassed ourselves badly.
translation.zh: 我知道你侄子和我有矛盾

translation.en: Sir, I'm here to offer you a peaceful solution.
translation.zh: 我到这来提出一个和平的解决方案

translation.en: How do you plan to accomplish that?
A race.
DK and I have caused nothing but problems for you, for us.
translation.zh:
DK和我给你带来了麻烦
给我们自己惹了麻烦

translation.en: And I'm asking you to allow us to settle this, once and for all.
translation.zh:
我请你允许我们解决掉麻烦
一劳永逸

translation.en: We race
and the loser leaves town for good.
I've already beat this piece of shit once!
translation.zh: 我已经赢过这烂人一次！

translation.en: Good.
Then it should be easy.
translation.zh: 那你这次也会赢得很轻松

translation.en: The cops took all the cars.
Hey!
That's why she's spitting.
translation.zh: 这就是它出问题的原因

translation.en: We almost there, Twink. Couple more tweaks.
translation.zh:
我们差不多准备好了 特文克
只是还需要一些微调

translation.en: It's not the car I'm worried about, man.
translation.zh: 我不是担心车 伙计

translation.en: DK picked this road for a reason. This is his mountain.
translation.zh:
DK选这条路是有原因的
这是他的山

translation.en: He's the only one to ever make it to the bottom.
translation.zh: 他是唯一一个走到底的赛车手

translation.en: Yeah!
-Yeah! -Yeah!
( grunts )
-Yeah! -Come on!
-Woo! -Come on, Sean.
Sean's the boss. Let's go.
translation.zh: 肖恩 你最棒了 加油

translation.en: Damn! Come on, man! That ain't right.
Yeah, baby!
That's what I'm talking about, man.
translation.zh: 太好了！我就说嘛！ 我就说嘛！

translation.en: Hey, yo, Sean! Yo, Sean!
Hey, check this out, man.
This dude over here wanna race the new DK.
translation.zh: 那个家伙要和新的DK比赛

translation.en: Heard he's been beating everybody around Asia, too.
translation.zh: 听说他也在亚洲所向无敌

translation.en: Not tonight, Twinkie.
Said he knew Han.
Said Han was family.
All right. Let's race.
Nice ride.
I won it from our friend Han a few years ago.
translation.zh: 我几年前从韩那赢来的

translation.en: I didn't know he was into American muscle.
translation.zh: 我不知道他喜欢美国车

translation.en: He was when he was rolling with me.
translation.zh: 他和我比赛时还很喜欢

translation.en: You know this ain't no 10-second race.
I got nothing but time.
You ready, kid?
Come on, Sean! Come on!
Ready!
Set!
Go!
♪ Rock, I rock ♪ ♪ I rock, I rock, I rock ♪
translation.zh: （所有特效均在专门的环境下）

translation.en: ♪ I roll, I roll, I roll ♪
translation.zh:
（所有特效均在专门的环境下） （由特效人员在封闭路段完成
请勿随意模仿本片中）

translation.en: ♪ Rock, I rock ♪
translation.zh:
（由特效人员在封闭路段完成
请勿随意模仿本片中）

translation.en: ♪ I rock, I rock, I rock ♪
translation.zh: （出现的动作、驾车或者玩车镜头）
